alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:32PM EDT until June 01 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY AND NORTHWESTERN DECATUR COUNTIES... At 632 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Shelbyville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Milford, Waldron and St. Paul. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 117 and 123. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
